title: Jessie James Decker shares photo of her kids: 'I will cherish this age and these memories forever'
text:
Jessie James Decker is spending some 'family time' with her three kids in Florida.

On Thursday morning, the mother-of-three shared a photo of her three kids that she shares with husband Eric Decker, 32, in a heartfelt post about the smiling babies growing up too fast.

The photo showed Vivianne, aged five, Eric Decker II, aged four, and Forrest Decker, aged one, laying the grass smiling up at the sky as Jessie's mom snapped a photo of the sweet moment.

Little ones: Jessie James Decker shared a photo of her three kids while on vacation in Florida with her family saying she will 'cherish this age and these memories forever'

'Love this pic my mama took of the sweet babies while we were at our Florida home having some family time. They are growing so fast I just can't believe it. I will cherish this age and these memories forever. Holding their little hands and smelling their toes and necks and getting those sweet kisses. I sure do love being their mommy,' she said in the post.

Her kids are constantly popping up on her Instagram as well as her former football wide receiver husband who shared a similar photo to his own account of him laying in the grass with his kids before writing: 'Love these babies so much.'

Back in 2013, the couple revealed that they were expecting their first baby together before adding that it was a 'surprise.'

'It wasn't planned. But when we did find out we both started crying and hugging each other. We're so excited and feel so blessed with having a baby. We're so excited,' she told E! News at the time.

Dad: Eric also shared a photo of him playing in the grass with his three kids

And while Eric says that he has officially retired from the NFL after just eight seasons, Jessie is saying it might not be the end of an era just yet.

'Jessie has been trying to do it forever. She thought I was gonna come back and play,' he said during an interview with with Extra. 'I still think he might,' his wife said.

While that comeback may be happening, Jessie has a new journey of her own after opening starting her own clothing line Kittenish, she says new music is also on the horizon for her.

'I have a new chapter that's about to happen with my music… I have new music coming out soon. I'm working on an EP that'll be dropping soon,' she told the outlet.

Love birds: Jessie and Eric smile back in September while at The Levi's Store in Times Square in New York City

Family: The family of five smiled for the camera while at the beach a year ago while on vacation

Jessie and Eric tied the knot back in 2013 in a gorgeous ceremony in St. Francis in Castle Rock, Colorado.

It was an exciting time for the happy couple as Jessie was counting down the days on her Twitter before she finally became Mrs. Decker.

The two met back in 2011 when Eric was training in Arizona and a mutual friend texted Jessie saying a cute guy was sitting at her table of friends.

A few years later, they got their claim to fame from the media when their reality series Eric and Jessie: Game On! aired on E! back in 2013.
description: Jessie James Decker is spending some 'family time' with her three kids in Florida. On Thursday morning, the mother-of-three shared a photo of her three kids that she shares with husband Eric.
